author: PFCal-dev
body:
The main updates are:
* Add trigger cell mappings not constrained by wafer boundaries (trigger cells can contain cells from several wafers)
* Add the BH section into the trigger simulation

Minor updates are:
* Fix small bug in energy calibration
* Updated ntuple producers

Depends on external  cms-data/L1Trigger-L1THGCal#5, but tests can be run without it.
title: HGCAL trigger updates (geometry, BH)
